body:
@tgamblin I'm not sure how much longer I can keep doing this. How much work would it be to make a bot that pops up on a PR and says "don't forget to update the tab completion script!" every time someone edits a file in `lib/spack/spack/cmd`?

@JBlaschke please use this version when you start working on your fish tab completion script.
title: Fix outdated bash tab completion
